resources.string:
Atoom TeleTEXT is an unofficial retro style text based browser for the teletext service provided by the Dutch Broadcasting Association (NOS)

Support this free app and remove all ads by making a â‚¬0.99 donation.

More info, code and feedback:
https://github.com/atoomnet/AtoomTT

Atoom TeleTEXT is an unofficial retro style text based browser for the teletext service provided by the Dutch Broadcasting Association (NOS)

More info, code and feedback:
https://github.com/atoomnet/AtoomTT
Thank you very much! Your donation was processed successfully. As a token of our appreciation we will now remove all banners!\n\nWe hope you will continue to enjoy Atoom TeleTEXT!

Oops.. your donation was cancelled. Your account will not be charged. If you did not intend to cancel something went wrong and you can try again in a little while.\n\nWe hope you will continue to enjoy Atoom TeleTEXT!
We have refunded your donation. No worries and feel free to click a banner every now and then ;)\n\nWe hope you will continue to enjoy Atoom TeleTEXT!
Oops.. something went wrong. Your account will not be charged. Feel free to try again in a little while.\n\nWe hope you will continue to enjoy Atoom TeleTEXT!
